name: Mécanisme
description:
"Their tricks are diabolical, the exits are locked, there's nowhere to hide in this dark place. The mechanisms move, the dice roll, who lives and who dies all depend on chance." - Sykcolo / AI

Mécanisme by @Sykcoloart

Taking something that most would consider ugly or repulsive and showing it in a different way that transforms it into something uniquely beautiful is the main passion behind this project that I called Metamorphoses.

This artwork is created using generative techniques to mutate and deconstruct a micrograph of a discarded rusty wire. 

Learn about the inspiration, story and techniques behind this project on my website: https://www.sykcolo.com/blog-1/the-metamorphoses-collection

https://linktr.ee/sykcolo

4000 × 4000 px

10 Editions

December 2021
